meanings.definition: A type of sweet bread loaf originally from Italy, typically containing candied fruits and raisins.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, my family enjoys sharing a panettone for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious panettone with various toppings.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the panettone on the floor, and my dog thought it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The panettone was a colorful explosion of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked panettone filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouths water.

meanings.definition: A traditional Christmas dessert in Italy and other countries.
meanings.sent1: Every year, we buy a panettone to enjoy on Christmas Eve.
meanings.sent2: In Italy, it is common to exchange panettone as gifts during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: Santa Claus left a panettone instead of cookies by the fireplace, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The panettone symbolized the warmth and joy of the festive season.
meanings.sent5: The golden wrapping of the panettone glistened under the Christmas lights, tempting us to indulge.
